setFullscreen

public void setFullscreen()
Set the Activity as fullscreen. Do not call this after calling setContentView() as this won't have effect!

setNoTitle

public void setNoTitle()
Set the Activity as having no titlebar, leaving only the notification area visible. Do not call this after calling setContentView() as this won't have effect!
